enhanced_by.reason: The toggleClass method relies on the current class names to determine whether to add or remove a class.
The toggleClass method modifies the 'class' attribute, which is handled by the attr method.
Both toggleClass and hasClass methods deal with class name manipulation and can be used to verify the state of class names after toggling.
The classNames method can be used to verify the updated set of class names after toggling a class.
